short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Pilleve's provider portal directly in your current browser window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to quickly open Pilleve's provider portal as a side panel in your current browser tab. Use the keyboard shortcut Alt+P to open and close the side panel.
